item.title: Get collection rollings
item.description: Get collection rollings # Returns rollings information about one or more collections. Examples # The following request gets the rollings information of all the collections under the default namespace: GET /default:*/_rollings Retrieve the rollings information of all the collections: GET /_rollings Request # GET /<target>/_rollings Path Parameters # target (Optional, String) Comma-separated, names of the collections to get (wildcard supported)
